ai-mil3.5.7:1.2_0: “Venerable Sir, there is anyone else whom this body is another.”
ai-mil3.5.7:1.4_0: “Sir, if that dragon won’t be released from this body, nor will I be released from sensual pleasures.”
ai-mil3.5.7:1.5_0: “Great king, if he does not call you bad deeds, that is why he’s was released from the wicked. That’s why he’s free from vanity.”
ai-mil3.5.7:2.2_0: “Great king, if someone were to take a man’s staff, what would you do?”
ai-mil3.5.7:2.4_0: “No, great king, that mango trees don’t have arrived at the hall.”
ai-mil3.5.7:2.5_0: “Sir, we’ve been reborn in a mango, that’s why there’s no rod.”
ai-mil3.5.7:2.6_0: “In the same way, great king, a person performs such name and form as the result of that deed, causing some bad deeds—harpelled by name and form—when he is calling someone else.”
ai-mil3.5.7:4.1_0: The seventh enquiry is the seventh thing.
